EmailTemplate.name: 18-Util Crit Comms-Util Architecture-Email-S1-Head Netk Comm-T003IH.Email 1 Broc
EmailTemplate.subject: Empower your business with smarter grid communications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Empowered for the new energy future Meet your grid and business challenges with an agile communications network Power utilities are looking for new ways to optimize distribution, address microgeneration and smart energy conservation trends, and boost revenues with innovative new business models. Learn how <[[https://tools.ext.nokia.com/onestore/?asset=205703&did=d000000001hq&utm_campaign=util_architecture&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email1-brochure-futurex&utm_term=power-util]]> the Nokia Bell Labs Future X architecture for power utilities can be your roadmap to build an intelligent, agile communications network that empowers you with the capabilies and flexibility needed to adapt to changing market demands and successfully drive your business into the new energy future. Find out how to empower your power utility for the new energy future https://networks.nokia.com/empowered <[[https://networks.nokia.com/empowered?did=d000000001hq&utm_campaign=util_architecture&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email1-brochure-futurex&utm_term=power-util]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
